meanings.definition: Sewn with a line of stitching on the top side of a garment or fabric.
meanings.sent1: The topstitched hem of the dress added a nice touch.
meanings.sent2: She wore a topstitched jacket to stay warm in the chilly weather.
meanings.sent3: The topstitched pillow looked like it had a fancy border.
meanings.sent4: Her topstitched scarf was a thread of elegance in the plain outfit.
meanings.sent5: The topstitched details on the bag made it stand out from the rest.

meanings.definition: To sew with a line of stitching on the top side of a garment or fabric.
meanings.sent1: She carefully topstitched the edges of the tablecloth.
meanings.sent2: The tailor topstitched the seams of the new dress.
meanings.sent3: He topstitched the curtains with precision, making them look neat.
meanings.sent4: The artist topstitched the fabric like painting a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The grandmother topstitched a quilt for her grandchild with love.
